resources.string: Sara Ruesga is a professional hairdresser since 1991, this is the first headquarters in Gijón in the street Poet Alfonso Camín.
Sara Ruesga. Hairdresser, makeup artist, creative and artist.
Title of the European Hairdressing Championship.
DRESSING WITH ME(VISTETE CONMIGO)\n Feature of the Spring Summer 2013 Collection of this fashion house.
BETWEEN BONDS(ENTRENLACES)\n Wedding reports that combine the talent of photographer David García Torrado and our stylist to create a collection of dream moments.
CHRONOS COLLECTION\n Camelia Ríos and Sara collaborate again in the presentation of this new creation of jewelry.
I\'M NOT YOUR ANGEL\n Angela is a more intrepid model with which Sara collaborates. From the most striking color combinations, to the most surprising cut-outs.
SPANISH DREAM\n Creative fantasy give volume to this collected with southern airs.
CORSET\n When a painter and photographer collaborate as Euliser Polanco and our stylist Sara appear such delicate and exquisite creations with a retro touch.
EARTH COLLECTION\n Sara lends her hands in the creation of looks suitable to accompany the creations of the Architects Joyera Camelia Rios.
